name: Small and Medium Entrepreneurs of Europe
goal: The purpose of “SME Europe” (Small and Medium Entrepreneurs of Europe) is to shape EU policies in a more SME friendly way. SMEs are the backbone of the European economy as it is especially them that create sustainable jobs, growth and prosperity.
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
SME Policy
Start-Ups Policy
Entrepreneurship
Regulation
Digital Agenda
Female Entrepreneurship
Energy
Family Business
Administrative Burdens
Regional Development
Finance Policy
Standardizations
